title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated contributor feedback message to be more appreciative and less demanding.
Revised admin documentation: changed navigation paths (from "Profile" to "General"), added guide for configuring user display names, and updated footer button text.
Removed references to Copilot Standalone and updated Copilot Coding Agent firewall hosts for self-hosted runners (plan-specific endpoints, deprecated `api.githubcopilot.com`).
Deprecated GraphQL `Team.viewerCanSubscribe` and `Team.viewerSubscription` fields (removal scheduled for 2026-07-01).

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated contributor feedback message to be more appreciative and less demanding.
- Revised admin documentation: changed navigation paths (from "Profile" to "General"), added guide for configuring user display names, and updated footer button text.
- Removed references to Copilot Standalone and updated Copilot Coding Agent firewall hosts for self-hosted runners (plan-specific endpoints, deprecated `api.githubcopilot.com`).
- Deprecated GraphQL `Team.viewerCanSubscribe` and `Team.viewerSubscription` fields (removal scheduled for 2026-07-01).
